mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_zalo_oa_token (access_token, refresh_token, expires_in, status, noted, created_by, updated_by) VALUES (#{accessToken}, #{refreshToken}, #{expiresIn}, #{status}, #{noted}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy})
mapper.select: SELECT access_token, refresh_token FROM sys_zalo_oa_token WHERE is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
